title: Ice Age
writer: Michael J. Wilson (story), Michael Berg (screenplay), Michael J. Wilson (screenplay), Peter Ackerman (screenplay), James Bresnahan (additional story), Doug Compton (additional story), Mike Thurmeier (additional story), Jeff Siergey (additional story), Galen T. Chu (additional story), Xeth Feinberg (additional story)
actors: Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic
plot: Back when the Earth was being overrun by glaciers, and animals were scurrying to save themselves from the upcoming Ice Age, a sloth named Sid, a woolly mammoth named Manny, and a saber-toothed tiger named Diego are forced to become unlikely heroes. The three reluctantly come together when they have to return a human child to its father while braving the deadly elements of the impending Ice Age.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 28 nominations.
